snippet: In New York City, a challenge by the livery-car industry could scuttle an important proposal that would permit passengers to summon a yellow cab using a smartphone.
lead_paragraph: In New York City, a challenge by the livery-car industry could scuttle an important proposal that would permit passengers to summon a yellow cab using a smartphone.

headline.seo: Hailing a Yellow Cab With an App
headline.main: Hailing a Yellow Cab With an App
headline.print_headline: Hailing a Yellow Cab With an App
